7.9  glass_old.inc

This file contains glass textures for POV-Ray versions 3.1 and earlier. These textures do not take advantage of the new features of POV-Ray 3.5 and are included for backwards compatability, you will get better results with the materials in glass.inc.

These textures are designed to be used with the I_Glass interior, also defined in this file.

7.9.2  glass_old.inc - Glass textures
